sentences: Aga mäletate – siin oli kask nagu mürakas, kallakuti järve poole.
context: The word 'mäletate' is the second person plural form of the verb 'mäletama' (to remember) in Estonian. It is used when addressing multiple people and asking if they remember something. The dictionary example shows it being used as a question starter: 'Aga mäletate – siin oli kask nagu mürakas, kallakuti järve poole.' which translates to 'But you remember - here there was an ash tree like a rowan tree, leaning toward the lake.' The word can also appear in other forms depending on context, such as 'mälete' (singular informal) or 'mäletad' (singular formal).
